title: Questions to Ask When Your Child Disobeys
itunes:author: Guest: Ginger Hubbard
itunes:summary: It can be difficult to teach young kids to slow down and acknowledge their sinful behavior. John and Danny offer helpful questions to ask to reach your child's heart. Receive the book I Can't Believe You Just Said That with your gift of any amount!
description: It can be difficult to teach young kids to slow down and acknowledge their sinful behavior. John and Danny offer helpful questions to ask to reach your child's heart. Receive the book I Can't Believe You Just Said That with your gift of any amount!
